meanings.sent1: The ursa roamed through the forest in search of food.
meanings.sent2: I saw an ursa at the zoo last weekend.
meanings.sent3: The ursa tried to climb a tree but ended up getting stuck.
meanings.sent4: The ursa's roar echoed through the mountains.
meanings.sent5: The ursa's fur was thick and brown, blending perfectly with the trees.

meanings.definition: A constellation in the northern sky, also known as Ursa Major or Ursa Minor
meanings.sent1: The ursa constellation is easy to spot on a clear night.
meanings.sent2: Many ancient cultures have stories about the ursa in the sky.
meanings.sent3: When I look at the ursa, I imagine it as a giant bear dancing among the stars.
meanings.sent4: The ursa constellation shines brightly, guiding travelers on their journey.
meanings.sent5: The ursa's position in the sky changes with the seasons, marking the passage of time.
